valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Hebrides 980 expected north of Faeroes 985 by midday tomorrow. New low expected devon 999 by same time
